Label: util_TNC_Single_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare + odt_skims['HOV2TOLL_DIST'] * TNC_single_costPerMile + odt_skims['HOV2TOLL_TIME'] * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_Shared_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_shared_baseFare + odt_skims['HOV2TOLL_DIST'] * TNC_shared_costPerMile + odt_skims['HOV2TOLL_TIME']* TNC_shared_costPerMinute, TNC_shared_costMinimum) * 100
